entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:20 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 9:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -1.4°C
Wind: ENE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Drizzle. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Drizzle or rain showers beginning overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Drizzle or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Drizzle or showers changing to rain in the afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. High 6. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow late in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
